verbose_text: We used unilateral intraspinal injection of an adeno associated virus (AAV) coding for Cre dependent expression of tetanus toxin light chain (TeLC) to selectively block synaptic transmission from PV cells in the L3-L5 segments and looked for the expression of cFOS as a marker of cell activation following simultaneous unilateral hindpaw stimulation of hairy and glabrous skin LTMRs.
evidence: expression of tetanus toxin light chain
